ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: You know who DD and otters from the original UO team work for now, yes you guessed it - Verant, Inc.! Slyde ... From: Rebecca Small
ygData.messageBody:
You know who DD and otters from the original UO team work for now, yes you
guessed it - Verant, Inc.!

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 09, 2000 10:53 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)


You know, this thread makes me wonder if UO missed us when we left for EQ.
Origin, especially DD, was the pits in customer service. Wonder if they
learned anything besides copying the PK switch. They are the sole reason I
will not ever consider a pvp game again.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
